title: Agfa Monotype site
content:
Is it just me of is the Agfa Monotype site completely sucky on the Mac?   
   
Lousy interface not withstanding.
author: anonymous

comments.content: Yeah. Impact. Eeww. (Impact is a free font too, available from Microsoft. Is it an Agfa font? Double eww).

Yeah, the AGFA site sucks hard. But the press release says they're re-designing it, so let's hope they rise to the occasion.   
   
I wonder who the domain belonged to before, and how much they paid for it. Since dot-com-land was covered with dot-bombs, squatters have been selling off domains for really cheap. But if a company is spending good money on getting a good domain, that's a good sign for the font business.
